Special Powers
MY POSSE 'N' I'LL GO, PERMISSION OR NOT: Passenger: 4, but only to carry bystanders. // At the beginning of the game, generate 2 Blightspoke Posse bystanders. If you were not first player, generate 4 instead.
DROP EM AND GIT: When Sheriff Gia Whitechapel or an adjacent friendly bystander makes a range attack, they may target equipped characters, or characters holding an object, regardless of line of fire.
YA'LL KEEP YOUR HEADS DOWN: Defend, Super Senses.
